File libsrc/libgobject/sp.c

This class contains some basic signal processing methods for TimeSeries objects.

See Also:

Public Function Index

SP_decimate (TimeSeries, int, bool)
Create a decimated TimeSeries.
SP_decimateData (float *, int, int, int, float *)
Decimate an array.
SP_demean (TimeSeries)
Demean the data values in a TimeSeries.

Public Functions

SP_decimate 
 TimeSeries SP_decimate(TimeSeries ts,
                        int rate,
                        bool clone_hashtable)
Create a decimated TimeSeries. Each segment is individually decimated at the same rate. For a rate of 1, there is no decimation. For a rate of 2, every second value is returned. For a rate of 3, every third value is returned, etc. Set clone_hashtable to False, if the input TimeSeries will be deleted after this routine. Set clone_hashtable True otherwise.

Parameters:
ts - A TimeSeries object.
rate - The input decimation rate.
clone_hashtable - If True, the returned TimeSeries will have a new hashtable. If False, it will use the input Hashtable.
SP_decimateData 
 void SP_decimateData(float *data,
                      int rate,
                      int n,
                      int remainder,
                      float *sdata)
Decimate an array.
SP_demean 
 double SP_demean(TimeSeries ts)
Demean the data values in a TimeSeries.

Parameters:
ts - A TimeSeries object.
Returns:
The mean data value in ts.
